sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from "react"; import styles from './formContainer.module.css' // import 'react-schedule-job/dist/index.css' import Button from '../Button/Button' import Schedule from 'react-schedule-job' import fetchBanks from "../../util/FetchBanks"; const axios = require('axios') // Name // Mobile // Email // Acc no // Start date - current date // Expiry date - duration // Debit amount // Debit Frequency // IFSC Code // PAN // Account type // Bank Code const FormContainer = (props) => { // UseRef Hooks const utilCodeRef = useRef() const shortCodeRef = useRef() const merchantCategoryCodeRef = useRef() const checkSumRef = useRef() const msgIdRef = useRef() const customerNameRef = useRef() const customerTelephoneRef = useRef() const customerEmailIdRef = useRef() const customerMobileRef = useRef() const customerAccountNoRef = useRef() const customerStartDateRef = useRef() const customerExpiryDateRef = useRef() const customerDebitAmountRef = useRef() const customerMaxAmountRef = useRef() const customerDebitFrequencyRef = useRef() const customerSequenceTypeRef = useRef() const customerIFSCRef = useRef() const customerReference1Ref = useRef() const customerReference2Ref = useRef() const channelRef = useRef() const filler1Ref = useRef() const filler2Ref = useRef() const filler3Ref = useRef() const filler4Ref = useRef() const filler5Ref = useRef() const filler6Ref = useRef() const filler7Ref = useRef() const filler8Ref = useRef() const filler9Ref = useRef() const filler10Ref = useRef() const [banks, setBanks] = useState() const fetchBankScheduler = () => { const b = axios.get('http://localhost:3001/fetchBanks').then(res => { setBanks(res.data) }).catch(e => console.log(e)) console.log("Banks Triggered") } useEffect(() => { fetchBankScheduler() }, []) const formSubmitHandler = (event) => { } const buttonChangeHandler = () => { console.log(banks) } const jobs = [ { fn: fetchBankScheduler, id: '1', schedule: '30 9,21 * * *' } ] return (
) } export default FormContainer
